page.title: 02TRANSPORT IN CLUNBURY AREA
page.content: Most people have cars because there are only two buses a day and because it is quick and quiet. There is one main road called the{B4368.}The road is fairly straight from{Clun}to{Little {Brampton.}The most popular car makes are{Ford}and{British Leyland.}The most popular car colours are metalic blue and silver. Most people have medium sized cars. There are lots of military jets and Hercules (Big cargo planes) flying low in this area to practice flying under the radar. People complainin a lot about the disturbance. There is one petrol station in{Aston-on-clun}and a Mazda car show room next door. The {B4368}is the widest road and is coated in tarmac, as are most of the smaller roads. Some of these are only single track.
